data.title: CNN fires back at President Trump after he attacked the network in a tweet Saturday for representing the U.S. “very poorly” to the world: “It's not CNN's job to represent the U.S to the world. That's yours. Our job is to report the news. #FactsFirst.”
Russia Has Deployed Thousands of Tanks, Troops to Ukraine
Pope holds minute of silence for Egypt mosque attack victims
Archbishop of Canterbury baffled by Christians who back Trump
Pentagon tried to block independent report on child sex among Afghan forces, Senate office says
Scientists grow baby coral on Barrier Reef.
The electricity used to mine bitcoin this year is bigger than the annual usage of 159 countries
Norway's $1 Trillion Wealth Fund Steps Up 'No' Votes on CEO Pay

Scientists have discovered that flies carry more diseases than suspected: The house fly and the blowfly together harbour more than 600 different bacteria...linked with human infections, including stomach bugs, blood poisoning and pneumonia.
The Javan Rhino was declared officially extinct.
Interpol: 40 human traffickers arrested, 236 children saved
30 women rescued from sex trafficking in Mexico

Nearly 90% of seabirds have plastic in their guts – Australian scientists updated estimates & say plastic in the ocean is increasing. “It’s pretty astronomical. In the next 10 years we will make as much plastic as has been made since industrial plastic production began in the 1950s.”

After decades of recovery, North Atlantic's right whales are now under threat from industrial fishing: 'there may now only be around 100 reproductively mature females left in the sea. Scientists fear the species could soon become the first great whale to become extinct in modern times'
Saudi Arabia buying British MPs with perks: Report
